author: Andrew R. Chow
title: ‘Come As You Are in the Family Car.’ Drive-In Church Services Are Taking Off During the Coronavirus Pandemic
description: In the midst of a pandemic, churchgoers are driving to church--and staying in their cars, as a way to congregate while practicing social distancing.
content:
When pastor Frank Carl delivers a sermon at Genoa Church in Westerville, Ohio, he typically hears a chorus of “amens.” On Sunday, he instead heard a deafening blast of honks.
And Carl wasn’t at the pulpit—he was about 25 feet off the ground on a scissor lift… [+14050 chars]
